src_original: ye vihāre gṛhisaṃjñāṃ dhārayiṣyanti /  te dārakadārikāparivṛtā bhaviṣyanti /
te sāṃghikaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ vaṃśikopabimbopadhānakaṃ śayanāsanaṃ asatparibhogena paribhokṣyante /
ye ca sāṃghikopacāre uccāraṃ prasrāvaṃ kurvanti,
te kūrmamakaramatsyeṣu jāyante /  ye sāṃghikaṃ tilataṇḍulakodravakulatthadhānyādīnasatparibhogena paribhūñjante,
